body_html: How the device placement is handled for the new high level api like estimators. Expecially with tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate where users don't handle model_fn manually to make explicit device assignment.
body_text: How the device placement is handled for the new high level api like estimators. Expecially with tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate where users don't handle model_fn manually to make explicit device assignment.
body: How the device placement is handled for the new high level api like `estimators`. Expecially with `tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate` where users don't handle `model_fn` manually to make explicit device assignment.
